entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:48 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
